SciOp is part of Safeguarding Research & Culture (SRC).
The bits must flow: let us resurrect the ancient art of Bittorrent to can ensure that our cultural, intellectual and scientific heritage exists in multiple copies, in multiple places, and that no single entity or group of entities can make it all disappear.
